Hey, I'm

Nate Grabner

Hi, I'm Nate - a Chicago-based, Indiana born Customer Experience Consultant with a passion for learning and great Thai food

Here's what I've worked on

Whether it's in work, school, or any other organization, I'm a firm proponent of keeping an entrepeneurial mindset and never holding back on the elbow grease. Here's a few of the projects I've worked on the past few years.

Purdue University

B.S. in Marketing & Certificate in Entrepreneurship, December 2018

West Lafayette, IN

Purdue provided me with a challenging education as well as numerous unique opportunities, both in and outside of the classroom. I was able to take classes in a variety of subjects, ranging from entrepreneurship and brand management, to computer science and data analytics. My curriculum included a number of real-world projects including developing a full brand strategy for a startup and creating a strategic growth plan for a local payroll company.

Purdue University Dance Marathon (PUDM)

VP of External Relations 2018
Greek Outreach Executive 2017

West Lafayette, IN
